message.body: Was your cannondale that got took blue?
yes, blue and black with head shock
ï¿¼This seems like its too small, but its a blue cannondale painted over, do you know the size? This was in the shed behind my house
I had a large. that's the exact frame shape though. I wouldn't know any marks or anything
Sorry to get your hopes up, i measured it...too small
I didn't exactly get my hopes up about that image or really the prospect of fixing it up. but it would be cool to find it one day
